applied_balance_amount.description: Customer's balance amount applied to this invoice. Can increase the total amount paid, if the customer has a negative balance,  or decrease it, if the customer has a positive balance.Amount in cents.
applied_balance_amount.title: Applied Balance Amount

billing_name.description: The name of the customer that should appear on the invoice.
billing_name.title: Billing Name

custom_field_data.description: Key-value object storing custom field values.
custom_field_data.title: Custom Field Data

deleted_at.description: Timestamp for when the customer was soft deleted.
deleted_at.title: Deleted At

email.description: The email address of the customer. This must be unique within the organization.
email.title: Email

email_verified.description: Whether the customer email address is verified. The address is automatically verified when the customer accesses the customer portal using their email address.
email_verified.title: Email Verified

external_id.description: The ID of the customer in your system. This must be unique within the organization. Once set, it can't be updated.
external_id.title: External Id

modified_at.description: Last modification timestamp of the object.
modified_at.title: Modified At

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization owning the customer.
organization_id.title: Organization Id

code.description: Code customers can use to apply the discount during checkout.
code.title: Code

ends_at.description: Timestamp after which the discount is no longer redeemable.
ends_at.title: Ends At

max_redemptions.title: Max Redemptions

modified_at.title: Modified At

name.title: Name

redemptions_count.description: Number of times the discount has been redeemed.
redemptions_count.title: Redemptions Count

due_amount.description: Amount in cents that is due for this order.
due_amount.title: Due Amount

invoice_number.description: The invoice number associated with this order.
invoice_number.title: Invoice Number

is_invoice_generated.description: Whether an invoice has been generated for this order.
is_invoice_generated.title: Is Invoice Generated

amount.description: Amount in cents, before discounts and taxes.
amount.title: Amount

label.description: Description of the line item charge.
label.title: Label

modified_at.description: Last modification timestamp of the object.
modified_at.title: Modified At

proration.description: Whether this charge is due to a proration.
proration.title: Proration

modified_at.description: Last modification timestamp of the object.
modified_at.title: Modified At

net_amount.description: Amount in cents, after discounts but before taxes.
net_amount.title: Net Amount

paid.description: Whether the order has been paid for.
paid.title: Paid

is_archived.description: Whether the product is archived and no longer available.
is_archived.title: Is Archived

is_recurring.description: Whether the product is a subscription.
is_recurring.title: Is Recurring

modified_at.description: Last modification timestamp of the object.
modified_at.title: Modified At

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization owning the product.
organization_id.title: Organization Id

recurring_interval.description: The recurring interval of the product. If `None`, the product is a one-time purchase.Note that the `day` and `week` values are for internal Polar staff use only.

trial_interval.description: The interval unit for the trial period.

trial_interval_count.description: The number of interval units for the trial period.
trial_interval_count.title: Trial Interval Count

cancel_at_period_end.description: Whether the subscription will be canceled at the end of the current period.
cancel_at_period_end.title: Cancel At Period End

canceled_at.description: The timestamp when the subscription was canceled. The subscription might still be active if `cancel_at_period_end` is `true`.
canceled_at.title: Canceled At

current_period_end.description: The end timestamp of the current billing period.
current_period_end.title: Current Period End

current_period_start.description: The start timestamp of the current billing period.
current_period_start.title: Current Period Start

customer_id.description: The ID of the subscribed customer.
customer_id.title: Customer Id

discount_id.description: The ID of the applied discount, if any.
discount_id.title: Discount Id

ended_at.description: The timestamp when the subscription ended.
ended_at.title: Ended At

ends_at.description: The timestamp when the subscription will end.
ends_at.title: Ends At

modified_at.description: Last modification timestamp of the object.
modified_at.title: Modified At

product_id.description: The ID of the subscribed product.
product_id.title: Product Id

recurring_interval.description: The interval at which the subscription recurs.
recurring_interval.title: SubscriptionRecurringInterval

started_at.description: The timestamp when the subscription started.
started_at.title: Started At

trial_end.description: The end timestamp of the trial period, if any.
trial_end.title: Trial End

trial_start.description: The start timestamp of the trial period, if any.
trial_start.title: Trial Start

subtotal_amount.description: Amount in cents, before discounts and taxes.
subtotal_amount.title: Subtotal Amount

total_amount.description: Amount in cents, after discounts and taxes.
total_amount.title: Total Amount
